description: Bisection of triangle A060098: even indexed members of column sequences of A060098 (not counting leading zeros).
comments: Row sums give A052975. Column sequences without leading zeros give for m=0..5: A000012 (powers of 1), A000290 (squares), A002417(n+1), A060103-5.Companion triangle (odd indexed members) A060556.
formula: a(n, m)= A060098(2*n-m, m).a(n, m)= sum(binomial((n-m)-j+2*m, 2*m)*binomial(m+1, 2*j), j=0..floor((m+1)/2)), n >= m >= 0, else zero.G.f. for column m: (x^m)*Pe(m+1, x)/(1-x)^(2*m+1), with Pe(n, x)=sum(binomial (n, 2*j)*x^j, j=0..floor(n/2)) (even members of row n of Pascal triangle A007318).
